rows.label: qev093101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey, just stopping by.
How's it poppin'?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_JNK0020
rows.name: Entertain

rows.label: qev093101_SEL0030
rows.name: Claim that you are, in fact, terrific.

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0040
rows.name: Heh. Glad to hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0050
rows.name:
You better be at the top of your game,
considering what we've got to tackle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_JNK0060
rows.name: Brood

rows.label: qev093101_SEL0070
rows.name: Glower at him with quiet, smoldering envy.

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0080
rows.name: Oh yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0085
rows.name:
You could see a storm brewing the moment
my mug showed up, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0090
rows.name:
I should give you more credit.
Guess you're always ready for trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0100
rows.name: Okay, that's enough small talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0110
rows.name:
I'll get straight to the point.
Will you spar with me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0120
rows.name:
The way Princess talks you up as her favorite subject,
I wanna get the measure of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0130
rows.name: I heard you even managed to put down the Vita once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0135
rows.name: Thing is, I'm the kinda guy who needs to see to believe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0140
rows.name:
Listen—the only thing that's gonna 
decide if you live or die...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0145
rows.name: is having friends you can trust to watch your back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0150
rows.name: I have to know if I can trust you with watching mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0155
rows.name: That's what I came here to find out, ahead of time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0160
rows.name:
So, what'll it be?
You gonna step up, or chicken out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_JNK0170
rows.name: Posture

rows.label: qev093101_SEL0180
rows.name: Tell him his ass is grass.

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0190
rows.name:
Ha ha! Fightin' words!
That's what I like to hear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0200
rows.name: Demur

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0210
rows.name: Plead with him to go easy on you.

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0220
rows.name:
Aw, don't be a killjoy.
Neither of us better pull any punches, 'kay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0230
rows.name:
I'll be piloting my Ares, but I'll let you decide
the rules of engagement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0240
rows.name:
We can go one-on-one, Skell-on-Skell,
or you could take me without—if you think you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0250
rows.name:
I don't mind if you bring your buddies with you either.
Team composition's all part of the fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0260
rows.name:
I've said what I wanted to say.
When you're ready, head over to Roof Rock, by the East Gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093101_MSG0270
rows.name: Ares and me—we can't wait to see what you've got.[ST:wait ]
